attributes.action: To create a permanent statue of Alan Turing occupying the fourth plinth in Trafalgar Square in recognition of …
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In recognition of Alan Turing’s brilliant use of mathematics contributing to the end world war 2.

In recognition of the injustice bestowed on a war hero driven to suicide for enjoying the freedoms he helped create.

As an apology to a great man.

rejection.details: The fourth plinth in Trafalgar Square is a matter for the Mayor of London.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
